argument.name: printeroptions
argument.description: Optional. Default = Use current printer configuration. A dot variable containing the desired printer configuration.

argument.name: saveoldoptions
argument.description: Optional. A dot variable to save the previous printer configuration.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.PRINTER_OVERRIDE() method sets the printer configuration, and optionally, saves the current configuration before overwriting it.
